translate.english: at this time / at this moment

examples.example: 这时阳光正好洒在大地上，一切都显得那么生机勃勃。

translate.english: At this time the sunlight is just sprinkling on the ground, and everything appears so vibrant.

examples.example: 这时微风吹过脸庞，带来了沁人心脾的花香。

translate.english: At this time, the gentle breeze blew across the face, bringing the refreshing floral fragrance.

examples.example: 这时天空中出现了一道美丽的彩虹，大家都兴奋地欢呼起来。

translate.english: At this time, a beautiful rainbow appeared in the sky, and everyone shouted excitedly.
